settings.content:
Let us help you decide how strong or subtle your highlights should be to complement the design of your cut or update for the season. Highlights can be subtle, natural-looking streaks or bold, chunky sections. Lowlights are darker strands woven into a lighter base. They can be used to tone down overly bright highlights or to blend away grey. Lowlights can be done in several different ways. The two main methods are done by using foil packets or a cap to separate the hair being colored from the rest of the hair. Highlights are strands of lighter colors in your hair, whereas lowlights are strands of darker colors. All services are based upon length, thickness, amount of product used, and quantity of process required to achieve desired effects.

Pricing:

  • Full foil (only): $220+
  • Partial foil (only): $175+
  • Face framing foil (only): $135+
  • Full balayage (only): $220+
  • Hand Painting (only): $220 - $280

NOTE: Prices listed do not include haircut or blowout!
